body.name: aigo Smart Watch for Men Women,Alexa Built-in,Bluetooth Calling,11+ Exercise Modes,Health Fitness Tracker with Heart Rate, Blood Oxygen Monitoring,IP68 Waterproof Watches for iOS Android(Two Bands)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 6 hrs 17 mins
features: Timeless Aesthetics, Smart Core: Classic Round Design. UM98 blends the timeless charm of a circular watch with a powerful modern technology core. Its rugged business style boasts a stainless steel body that's built to withstand tough conditions, while the expansive 1.45-inch full touchscreen provides a stunning visual experience.

Versatile Watch Faces, Dual Straps: Customize your UM98 with a variety of watch face options and the flexibility to switch between two different strap materials, catering to your style and personalization preferences.

Your Ultimate Smart Companion: Instant Voice Activation and Multilingual Support. Seamlessly access your smartphone's voice assistant with a single long press and enjoy multilingual translation support, making global travel effortless.

Rugged Fitness, Unwavering Durability: IP68 Waterproof and Comprehensive Health Tracking. UM98 fearlessly takes on challenges with its IP68 water resistance and support for multiple sports modes. Additionally, it offers comprehensive health monitoring, including heart rate, stress, blood oxygen, and sleep tracking, ensuring your well-being is a top priority.
Extended Battery Life: Long-Lasting Power. Bid farewell to frequent charging, and revel in extended battery life, ensuring your rugged adventures endure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product with long battery life
reviews.reviewText: The setup is not as easy as I thought, but hey, for the price I can’t really complain much. The build quality is great and it looks great. I love that I don’t have to charge it everyday, and have to constantly worry about the battery life.It’s a great buy at this price. Notification and basic functionality is all there and that’s exactly what I’m looking for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Watch was really nice looks a regu watch but is actually smart love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Stylish, but saddled with a confusing, annoying App for access !
reviews.reviewText: This stylish hefty Aigo watch (comes with leather and black rubber bands) requires an app (WearFit Pro) on your cell phone which when downloaded annoyingly floods your phone with a call for credit card data, and, copious “pop up” ads, striking fear, loathing and confusion in the user as one struggles for information as to one’s exercise routine. Even when you pass the app’s formidable entry gate, your iPhone screen is deluged with a myriad of distracting information, relevant or not, to your health but surely to empty your bank. Contrast the direct neatness of the Withings brand watch and appreciate data rather than these diversions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good price, very good watch
reviews.reviewText: it was packaged very well. that is really important to me, it tells me what quality of brand they are. it comes with two bands so that was a neat surprise. it says its ip68 waterproof and if it is, that's impressive because I use a lot of security cameras who have the same IP68 rating and they can handle basically a hail storm. so that's also very pleasant to see for such an economical price.I looked through the features and it has a lot of them. it has Alexa of course, and I can make my calls with it as well though bluetooth. it connected easily enough and stayed connected through bluetooth. the heart rate monitor works really well. I guess the technology isnt that new so pretty much every watch can do that now, but this one does it well. I was expecting less for some reason. very nice to see. it has a bunch of health modes too that im still looking through. I also think I can download extra features but I haven't looked into that yet. it also has blood oxygen monitor so that is very cool. useful when I get a flu I can see how im doing. that's a new feature I never had before. I have been using it a lot just to play with it.I love the look. looks just like a regular watch until you see it close up. I like the band too. feels nice and feels quality also. I chose the brown. the battery lasts a long time as well. and it seems pretty tough, so we will see how it holds up to the everyday wear and tear. overall a great purchase. A+

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great smart watch
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love my aigo Smart Watch! The sleek black design adds a touch of sophistication, and its heart rate monitor provides accurate readings. The fitness tracking and calorie counter feature help me stay on top of my health goals effortlessly. The compatibility with both iOS and Android phones is a major plus, and the long-lasting battery ensures I can rely on it throughout the day. A fantastic investment for anyone looking to enhance their fitness journey with style and functionality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish smart watch!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the SmartWatch and it has exceeded my expectations. The watch seamlessly blends timeless aesthetics with cutting-edge technology. The customizable watch faces allow me to match the watch with any outfit, and the dual straps add versatility. The voice activation feature is incredibly convenient, and the multilingual support is a game-changer for my global travels. The rugged design not only looks great but also ensures durability. The health tracking features, including heart rate and sleep monitoring, make it my ultimate smart companion. With extended battery life, I can confidently take on my daily adventures. The aigo smartwatch truly brings smart life to a new level.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is really a great smart watch. The band is much nicer than most smart watches come with, which are usually some cheap looking, rubber situation. The watch itself is easy to set up, just download the app and customize for your needs. It holds a charge for a long time, and does every single thing the more expensive watches do. You can take calls and text, as well as all the fitness features, and time management options. I'm really happy with this and definitely recommend to anyone interested in getting a smart watch. You'll really like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smart watch Excellence
reviews.reviewText: Sleek, durable, and packed with features. This smartwatch is my trusted companion for every adventure.
